name: Hologram 3D Prank Simulator
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Hologram.
Hologram 3D Prank Simulator
Hologram 3D Simulator joke - this simulation game where you can play on your phone as a 3D hologram. The game uses the camera for a more realistic effect!
Make fun and play your friends and loved ones!
Thank you for playing our games! Leave us feedback and we will try to make our games even better for you!
